sqls.sql: SELECT inbox.id, inbox.subject, inbox.message_type, inbox.ref_no, inbox.service, inbox.created_dt FROM INTER_INBOX AS inbox WHERE 1=1 <#if message_type??> AND CHARINDEX(:message_type, inbox.message_type) >0</#if> <#if STATUS??> AND inbox.STATUS = :STATUS</#if>

SELECT app.id, app.application_no, app.app_type, app.status, app.service_id, app.created_dt FROM APPLICATION AS app WHERE 1=1 <#if app_type??> AND CHARINDEX(:app_type, app.app_type) >0</#if> <#if STATUS??> AND app.STATUS = :STATUS</#if> <#if application_no??> AND app.application_no = :application_no</#if>
